data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: People in my country love to give gifts to others as a gesture of their good wishes and to show that they care. If someone invites a person to a birthday party, a wedding ceremony, or a baby shower, the invited guest always brings gifts. We often buy gifts whenever someone invites us to their house even if this is just a social visit. Thus, gift-giving is a part of our tradition. I must mention here that during Christmas time, people exchange gifts and cards more than any time of the year. (93字)
data.referenceText: On what special occasions in your country do people give gifts?
data.referenceTranslate: 在你们国家什么特殊的场合人们会送礼物?
